contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 28, 1958 D Yorkshire v. Lancashire Contest (Class A)
Yorkshire v. Lancashire Contest (Class A) 10 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire v. Lancashire Contest yorkshire-v-lancashire-contest-class-a
Venus and Adonis
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £20 and cup, 2nd £15 and trophy, 3rd £10 and cup. 4th annual contest. 11 bands competed. Total points combined with section B - Yorkshire 1947, Lancashire 1929.
Aug. 18, 2013, 11:55 a.m. May 20, 2015, 9:06 p.m.
1 Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth
2 Hade Edge Harold Swallow
3 Skelmanthorpe Band Ernie Appleyard
4 Mossley Band Derek Sanderson
